entry.string: An error has been detected in the module versions!
entry.translation: Un irrur hes beee detected in zee mudoole-a ferseeuns!

entry.string: There is a discrepancy between the module version stored in the database and the module version found in the file system. If you continue to run with an older version of the module files, you can severely corrupt your data.
entry.translation: Zeere-a is a deescrepuncy betveee zee mudoole-a ferseeun stured in zee detebese-a und zee mudoole-a ferseeun fuoond in zee feele-a system. Iff yuoo cunteenooe-a tu roon veet un oolder ferseeun ooff zee mudoole-a feeles, yuoo cun seferely curroopt yuoor deta.

entry.string: The module has been marked inactive until this discrepancy is corrected.
entry.translation: Zee mudoole-a hes beee merked inecteefe-a unteel thees deescrepuncy is currected. Bork bork bork!
Updete-a zee mudooles feeles. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

entry.string: Download the latest version of module
entry.translation: Doonlued zee letest ferseeun ooff mudoole

entry.string: Update the module version in the database.
entry.translation: Updete-a zee mudoole-a ferseeun in zee detebese-a.

entry.string: If modules files are up to date, you can update the database to the current version. Only do this if you are absolutely certain the module files are up to date.
entry.translation: Iff mudooles feeles ere-a up tu dete-a, yuoo cun updete-a zee detebese-a tu zee coorrent ferseeun. Bork bork bork! Oonly du thees iff yuoo ere-a ebsulootely certeeen zee mudoole-a feeles ere-a up tu dete-a.
